original_text: They killed Sihon, king of the Amorites, who lived in Heshbon. He ruled half of the Gilead region. That is from Aroer that was on the edge of the Arnon valley, as far as the Jabbok river. The Ammonites had the land on the other side of the river.
korean_text: 시혼은 헤스본에 거주하던 아모리 족속의 왕이라 그가 다스리던 땅은 아르논 골짜기 가에 있는 아로엘에서부터 골짜기 가운데 성읍과 길르앗 절반 곧 암몬 자손의 경계 얍복 강까지이며

sentences.original_text: They killed Sihon, king of the Amorites
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 아모리 족속의 왕인 시혼을 죽였다

sentences.original_text: He ruled half of the Gilead region
That is from Aroer that was on the edge
as far as the Jabbok river
on the other side of the river
